ResearchProjectDef.label: cloning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Extract enough genetic material from a single donor to grow a clone and mirculously transform it into a living embryo. All of the donor's endogenes will be copied to the new clone, but not their xenogenes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced cloning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Glitterworld cloning techniques that can generate a living embryo from dead genetic material and clone advanced archotech genes.
